job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Contract to Hire - $80 - $100 / hour DOE<br><br>Client is looking to bring in a Machine Learning resource to help with 3 major projects. Need to have a mixture of Programming, Data Engineering/Structures, Probability/Statistics background.<br><br><strong><u>Skill Set Required<br><br></u></strong>Large project experience with Machine Learning<br><br>Programming Skills - C / C++ / R / Java / Python<br><br>Data Engineering/Data Structure experience/knowledge<br><br>Machine Learning Algorithms/Libraries<br><br>Consutling background is highly preffered<br><br><strong>Other Data I Pulled from ML Skill Sets / Resumes<br><br></strong>Data Visualization<br><br>Predictive Analysis<br><br>Statistical Modeling<br><br>Data Mining<br><br>Clustering &amp; Classification<br><br>Data Analytics<br><br>Quantitative Analysis<br><br>Web Scraping<br><br>Model Development
